name: Appropriations - S/C on Infrastructure, Resiliency & Invest

participants.name: Appropriations - S/C on Infrastructure, Resiliency & Invest

agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Infrastructure, Resiliency & Invest TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Wednesday, March 6, 2019 PLACE: E1.030 CHAIR: Rep. Giovanni Capriglione The Appropriations Subcommittee on State Infrastructure, Resiliency, and Investments will meet in a formal meeting to discuss House budget recommendations. The subcommittee will be taking up items related to Information Technology, Cybersecurity, Capital Needs, and CAPPs. As a reminder, no public or agency testimony may be taken during a formal meeting.
